platformIndependence.pltIndependenceDesc: The Java program code is stand alone for android operating system available on most smart phones. The server side php script is also stand alone to privately managed hosting server.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: Data obfuscation is used to extract data from the system data sources making an effort to protect private data presenting to the client device.

privacyComplianceList: THE REPUBLIC OF UGANDA. THE DATA PROTECTION AND PRIVACY ACT, 2019.
adherenceSteps: Institution Review Board (IRB) project review, clearance from the Uganda National Council For Science & Technology (UNCST) for research and data collection

standardsList: Agile software development standards, software development methodologies based on iterative development, where requirements and solutions evolve through collaboration between self-organizing cross-functional teams.

typesOfDataCollected: full name, GPS location, picture of head of household, picture of household
